post: I'm so tired all the time. No matter how much I sleep, I still feel exhausted and drained.
criterion: Fatigue or loss of energy nearly every day

post: I feel worthless and guilty about everything. I blame myself for things that aren't even my fault.
criterion: Feelings of worthlessness or excessive or inappropriate guilt

post: I can't concentrate on anything. I can't make simple decisions, and my mind feels foggy.
criterion: Diminished ability to think or concentrate, or indecisiveness

post: I have so much energy today! I went for a run, cleaned the house, and still have energy left.
criterion: Fatigue or loss of energy nearly every day

post: I'm proud of what I've accomplished. I know I'm doing my best and that's enough.
criterion: Feelings of worthlessness or excessive or inappropriate guilt
